sentence.text: The positive regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II gene plays a critical role as an oncogene in diverse tumors.

entity.text: positive regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II

sentence.text: However, the functional role of positive regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II and the mechanism regulating HOXB1 expression in glioma are not fully understood.

entity.text: positive regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II

sentence.text: A preliminary bioinformatics analysis showed that positive regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II is ectopically expressed in glioma, and that HOXB1 is a possible target of protein polyubiquitination-3175.

entity.text: positive regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II

sentence.text: In this study, we investigated the function of positive regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II and the relationship between HOXB1 and protein polyubiquitination-3175 in glioma.

entity.text: positive regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II

sentence.text: We show that positive regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II expression is significantly downregulated in glioma tissues and cell lines, and that its expression may be closely associated with the degree of malignancy.

entity.text: positive regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II

sentence.text: Reduced positive regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II expression promoted the proliferation and invasion of glioma cells, and inhibited their apoptosis in vitro, and the downregulation of HOXB1 was also associated with worse survival in glioma patients.

entity.text: positive regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II

sentence.text: The downregulated expression of protein polyubiquitination-3175 inhibited cell proliferation and invasion, and promoted apoptosis in glioma.
The oncogenicity induced by low positive regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II expression was prevented by an protein polyubiquitination-3175 inhibitor in glioma cells.

entity.text: positive regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II

sentence.text: Our results suggest that positive regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II functions as a tumor suppressor, regulated by protein polyubiquitination-3175 in glioma.

entity.text: positive regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II
